instance.description:
Armored Car sdkfz 222 entity.
With the radio upgrade, can see units in the FoW and steal resources from enemy sectors.

float.name: outer_height
float.comment:
Based on the comments, it feels like this should be less than 0 and it traditionally has been. However, through testing, it seems like even if this is set to 0, units are still able to see below them just fine.
NOTE: Jianfu suggested that this may exist just to soften the slope of the lampshade. -Brock 2017

enum.name: unit_type
enum.comment: This affects how the divert_supplies ability works and which nodes it runs. I didn't want to copy two huge trees and have to update them both if one changed, so if its going to siphon resources, it has this unit class.

template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment: temporarily setting to physical_infantry so that it will fire its weapon properly.

float.name: outer_height
float.comment:
Based on the comments, it feels like this should be less than 0 and it traditionally has been. However, through testing, it seems like even if this is set to 0, units are still able to see below them just fine.
